instructions.dek:
How it works: Each week, we provide an original cartoon in need of a caption. You, the reader, can submit a caption for that week’s contest; help us find the best (and root out the worst) by rating the funniness of captions from the previous week’s contest; or help select the winning caption by voting on three finalists from the week prior.

Feel free to dive in and get voting, even if you haven’t submitted a caption. Many strive to etch their names into the hall of fame of cartoon captioning. Do you have what it takes?

Please refer to the complete rules for additional details.
